Subject: Order No 652592122602565632 dated 26-11-2025

Description:
I regret to state that in my above captioned order all the medicines were sent wrongly. After my complaint on 01-12-2025, I was assured that this wrong order will be picked up in next 24 hours and my amount will be refunded to me. 
But to my surprise this order has not been picked up since then even after my four reminder to your customer care no. 
For a company of your repute this kind of careless mistake and further delay in  rectification is not appreciated. 
Keeping high standard of your professional ethics please take the immediate steps and refund my amount as soon as possible.

Thanking you 
Regards
Ashutosh Saraff

notes.body: Hello MD Aurangzeb,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     For the Free Doctor Consultation offer after completing your order. We are happy to guide you on how to avail this benefit:  Visit the “My Orders” section in your account.  Locate the relevant order and click on the Free Doctor Consultation option.  A coupen code will be displayed on the screen.  Use Coupen code to proceed further and select your preferred doctor, along with the date and time for the consultation.  Once you have selected the date and time, click on “Place Order”. Your consultation will then be scheduled without any payment.  Please note: This option will only be visible for orders where the Free Doctor Consultation offer was available at the time of placing the order.     Regards,  Shruti Vaviya
notes.body_html:
Hello MD Aurangzeb,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

For the Free Doctor Consultation offer after completing your order. We are happy to guide you on how to avail this benefit:

Visit the “My Orders” section in your account.

Locate the relevant order and click on the Free Doctor Consultation option.

A coupen code will be displayed on the screen.

Use Coupen code to proceed further and select your preferred doctor, along with the date and time for the consultation.

Once you have selected the date and time, click on “Place Order”. Your consultation will then be scheduled without any payment.

Please note: This option will only be visible for orders where the Free Doctor Consultation offer was available at the time of placing the order.

Regards,
Shruti Vaviya

notes.body_html:
Hello Pallavi,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

We tried calling on the contact number 9739400128; however, we were unable to connect. We also tried calling on the number 9466452525; however, the call gets disconnected after 1 ring, which means our number is auto-disconnected, as it may be marked as spam. 

Kindly note that the payment for order #654239114370719744-92830 is successful, and this is still in transit. As checked, there is another order #653803992805539840-88620 for item DR. MOREPEN OMEGA3 DEEP SEA FISH OIL 1000 MG FOR HEALTHY HEART | BRAIN & JOINTS|60 SOFTGEL placed from the number 9466452525. The online payment for this order failed, and it seems the attempt to deliver was made for this order for which the payment needs to be made. Kindly contact the courier partner and make the payment to deliver the same.
 
You can also contact our customer care team at 8071324888 if you still have any concerns. The call will connect from the registered mobile numbers.

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels on the app or website listed in the "Need Help" section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Safe.

Regards,
PharmEasy

notes.body: Hello Arijit,     Greetings from PharmEasy!       With regards to the order ID #651682701127917568-97392, I understand your concern, and I will surely assist you with this.  Please be informed that, as per the latest government notification, the Goods and Services Tax (GST) rates on certain medicines have been revised. This revision is applicable across all retailers and pharmacies, including PharmEasy.  Accordingly, you may notice a change in the final billing amount of your orders, reflecting the updated 5 % GST rates. The GST bifurcation is clearly mentioned in your invoice, and you may refer to it for detailed information.  We sincerely regret any inconvenience this may cause and assure you that the charges are as per the updated government regulations.     Also, I would like to inform you that the products listed in the app are not linked to the price. Thus, we share the estimated cost at the time of order placement, which can be either higher or lower than the actual price. We send you an SMS/push notification for the total discounted amount that needs to be paid as soon as your medicines are procured.  Sometimes, the MRP of the medicines may vary depending on the stock received by the chemist. This price variation will always be due to price changes by the medicine manufacturer. However, if the pricing on the medicine packaging differs from what is printed on the bill, please get back to us with the image of the medicine highlighting the batch number so that we can get the issue resolved.     For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the Need Help section. Alternatively, you can also call us on 8071324888.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay healthy.     Regards,  Tahera
notes.body_html:
Hello Arijit,

Greetings from PharmEasy!     

With regards to the order ID #651682701127917568-97392, I understand your concern, and I will surely assist you with this.

Please be informed that, as per the latest government notification, the Goods and Services Tax (GST) rates on certain medicines have been revised. This revision is applicable across all retailers and pharmacies, including PharmEasy.

Accordingly, you may notice a change in the final billing amount of your orders, reflecting the updated 5 % GST rates. The GST bifurcation is clearly mentioned in your invoice, and you may refer to it for detailed information.

We sincerely regret any inconvenience this may cause and assure you that the charges are as per the updated government regulations.

Also, I would like to inform you that the products listed in the app are not linked to the price. Thus, we share the estimated cost at the time of order placement, which can be either higher or lower than the actual price. We send you an SMS/push notification for the total discounted amount that needs to be paid as soon as your medicines are procured.

Sometimes, the MRP of the medicines may vary depending on the stock received by the chemist. This price variation will always be due to price changes by the medicine manufacturer. However, if the pricing on the medicine packaging differs from what is printed on the bill, please get back to us with the image of the medicine highlighting the batch number so that we can get the issue resolved.

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the Need Help section. Alternatively, you can also call us on 8071324888.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay healthy.

Regards,
Tahera

notes.body: Hello Dev Yeru,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     This mail is with regards to your order #651276779262500864-32857, we apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.      As per update received from our team, please be informed that the excess refund of Rs.193.44/- has been initiated on 07 December 2025. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.      Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,  PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Dev Yeru,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
 
This mail is with regards to your order #651276779262500864-32857, we apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order. 
 
As per update received from our team, please be informed that the excess refund of Rs.193.44/- has been initiated on 07 December 2025. The refund will be credited to your payment source account within 5-7 business days. We appreciate your patience in the meantime.
 
We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.
 
For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 
 
Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!
 
Regards,
PharmEasy

notes.body:
Dear Sudip Banerjee,          Thank you for contacting BHIM support regarding a recent transaction in our app.     We understand your concern regarding the failed UPI transaction where the amount was debited from your account. The issue occurred due to bank server (CBS) being offline at the time of processing. This is a temporary issue.     Please be assured that the debited amount will be automatically refunded to your account within T+1 working day (or up to 3–5 working days in rare cases), as per NPCI guidelines.     If the refund is not received within 5 working days, please out to your bank.     Regards,  Abdul B  BHIM Support       
                           
                            On
                            Thu, 4 Dec at  5:30 PM
                            ,  Sudip Banerjee <sudip.banerjee93@gmail.com>  wrote:
                             
 
“CAUTION: This email originated
from outside of the organization! Do not click links, open attachments, or
reply, unless you recognize the sender's email address and know the content is
safe! Please report to “ soc@npci.org.in
“ if found suspicious.”

notes.body_html:
Dear Sudip Banerjee,


Thank you for contacting BHIM support regarding a recent transaction in our app.

We understand your concern regarding the failed UPI transaction where the amount was debited from your account. The issue occurred due to bank server (CBS) being offline at the time of processing. This is a temporary issue.

Please be assured that the debited amount will be automatically refunded to your account within T+1 working day (or up to 3–5 working days in rare cases), as per NPCI guidelines.

If the refund is not received within 5 working days, please out to your bank.

Regards,
Abdul B
BHIM Support

On Thu, 4 Dec at 5:30 PM , Sudip Banerjee <sudip.banerjee93@gmail.com> wrote:
“CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization! Do not click links, open attachments, or reply, unless you recognize the sender's email address and know the content is safe! Please report to “ soc@npci.org.in “ if found suspicious.”

helpdesk_ticket.description:
*ORDER ID - 6228729SLOT - 13;00PM TO 14:00PM DATE - 04/12/25TEST -
COMPREHENSIVE FULL BODY CHECKUP WITH VITAMIN D AND B 12.BOOKED FOR SELF
(SHIVANI PATHAK)*

Hi,
I booked a sample collection for the test mentioned above. Nobody showed up
for the collection.
*ABHIJEET SIYARAM YADAV* - assigned phlebotomist called me around *11.48am*
asking if he can do the collection at that time when i asked him to collect
samples in the chosen time slot which was *1pm-2pm. *

I have been trying to get this issue sorted since 2pm, I called your
customer care number *7022000900* and on all the calls they said the issue
has been escalated and no immediate resolution was discussed, nor did
anyone from your team contact me even after so many calls.

This is highly negligent, unprofessional and irresponsible behaviour on
your part. You are a company that provides medical services! you need to be
apt, on time, liable and should have fast resolutions to such petty issues.

I called the same customer care number at *3.47pm* and even asked them if
they could assign a phlebotomist. I am waiting and I would be able to give
the samples. explained to them how I have been fasting for the test and
have been waiting yet no useful outcome came out of that conversation.

I have been fasting for over ten hours now which is quite inhumane, at
least I could have been told that the pickup would be rescheduled to a
later date !


*It's 4:42pm right now as I write this email to you, yet no update from
your team or on your app.*
*As per your website and app you promise that if samples aren't collected
on time TEST ARE FREE right? *( which i didn't even ask for till 4pm i just
wanted someone to collect samples and get my tests done but here we are)

I want a few things from you now.



*1- I want you to issue a full refund to the source account. 2- I want your
team to get in touch with me and schedule the same test for free as you
promised on your app and website as per my schedule and availability. *
I wasn't willing to do so but after so much trouble you and your team has
put me through, the least you guys can do is to stick to your words.

Looking forward to a quick resolution towards this issue.

*It's 4:52PM yet neither anyone from your team has gotten in touch with me
nor the status on your app has been updated, extremely sad and inefficient
on your part. *


* please find screenshots attached in the end of the email thanks.




*Shivani Pathak.(7999761802)*

[image: image.png]
[image: image.png][image: image.png][image: image.png]

--

BOOKED FOR SELF (SHIVANI PATHAK)

Hi,
I booked a sample collection for the test mentioned above. Nobody showed up for the collection. 
ABHIJEET SIYARAM YADAV - assigned phlebotomist called me around 11.48am asking if he can do the collection at that time when i asked him to collect samples in the chosen time slot which was 1pm-2pm. 

I have been trying to get this issue sorted since 2pm, I called your customer care number 7022000900 and on all the calls they said the issue has been escalated and no immediate resolution was discussed, nor did anyone from your team contact me even after so many calls.

This is highly negligent, unprofessional and irresponsible behaviour on your part. You are a company that provides medical services! you need to be apt, on time, liable and should have fast resolutions to such petty issues. 

I called the same customer care number at 3.47pm and even asked them if they could assign a phlebotomist. I am waiting and I would be able to give the samples. explained to them how I have been fasting for the test and have been waiting yet no useful outcome came out of that conversation.

I have been fasting for over ten hours now which is quite inhumane, at least I could have been told that the pickup would be rescheduled to a later date !

It's 4:42pm right now as I write this email to you, yet no update from your team or on your app.

As per your website and app you promise that if samples aren't collected on time TEST ARE FREE right? ( which i didn't even ask for till 4pm i just wanted someone to collect samples and get my tests done but here we are)

Looking forward to a quick resolution towards this issue. 

It's 4:52PM yet neither anyone from your team has gotten in touch with me nor the status on your app has been updated, extremely sad and inefficient on your part.

Shivani Pathak.

notes.body: Hello Shivani ,   Greetings from PharmEasy!  We refer to your below mail & Order id (6228729) regarding the service failure   On reviewing your highlighted concern, we found this to be a very rare scenario that unfortunately impacted your experience with us. To ensure such incidents do not recur and to maintain the quality of our service for all our valued customers, precautionary measures will be implemented in line with company policy.  Further, we would like to inform you that post order completion, we shall proceed with the OTOF cashback of up to Rs. 1499/- in your PharmEasy wallet with a validity of 60 days .   You can pay 5% of your medicine order value with PharmEasy Credits. You can pay 50% of your Lab Test Booking value with PharmEasy Credits.  However, we regret to inform you that your request for additional compensation could not be processed and also as discussed your refund has been initited and you will receive with in 5 to 7 working days in your same source account .   For more information on the OTOF policy, please refer to the links below:  https://pharmeasy.in/legal/terms-and-conditions & https://campaigns.pharmeasy.net/otof-tnc/  We understand your concerns & sincerely regret the inconvenience caused to you.  For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.   Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!  Regards, Litu Behera  Complaints & Redressals  PharmEasy

However, we regret to inform you that your request for additional compensation could not be processed and also as discussed your refund has been initited and you will receive with in 5 to 7 working days in your same source account .

For more information on the OTOF policy, please refer to the links below:

https://pharmeasy.in/legal/terms-and-conditions & https://campaigns.pharmeasy.net/otof-tnc/

We understand your concerns & sincerely regret the inconvenience caused to you.

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,

notes.body_html:
Hello Kunal,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

This email is with regards to your order # 652242192093458432-86678, we apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.

Please note that our team tried calling you multiple times on 9879265163, however you were non contactable.

As per update received form our team, please note that marking can be done once we received the images of AWB medicin invoice and medicne with batch number and PHarmEasy barcode (smalll QR code sticker stuck on all medicines) details from your end. Without we are unable to update the order satus and rais the return request.

Hence we request you to share the above required details, once we received the details we will reopen this ticket.

If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
PharmEasy

notes.body: Hello Priyansh,  Greetings from PharmEasy!   With regards to your order #654100324385792000-89266, the estimated delivery date is 04th December to 07th December 2025.  I would like to inform you that the estimated date of delivery depends on the availability of the medicines and the delivery pin code. Also, be informed, PharmEasy will always try to ensure that your order is delivered at the earliest, as we completely understand the urgency of the medicine.  As of now, the speed-up delivery feature is unavailable with us. Once the order is out for delivery, you will receive an SMS with the contact details of the delivery executive along with the 4-digit pin. Once the details are shared with you, you may coordinate with the delivery executive for exact timings.   For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.    Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.  Regards,  Habiba
notes.body_html:
Hello Priyansh,

Greetings from PharmEasy! 

With regards to your order #654100324385792000-89266, the estimated delivery date is 04th December to 07th December 2025.

I would like to inform you that the estimated date of delivery depends on the availability of the medicines and the delivery pin code. Also, be informed, PharmEasy will always try to ensure that your order is delivered at the earliest, as we completely understand the urgency of the medicine.

As of now, the speed-up delivery feature is unavailable with us. Once the order is out for delivery, you will receive an SMS with the contact details of the delivery executive along with the 4-digit pin. Once the details are shared with you, you may coordinate with the delivery executive for exact timings.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 

 Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.

Regards,
Habiba
